description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

If src_filename=Forest and l2vs=0, then stand_structure=S. If src_filename=Forest and (l1vs>0 and l2vs>0) then stand_structure=M. If src_filename=Forest and (l1vs>1 and l2vs>1) then stand_structure=C. Validation should check for null and that l1vs and l2vs are integers.
If src_filename is Forest and stand_structure is S, then num_of_layers is 1. If stand_structure is M or C, num_of_layers = 2. Validation should check for null and that l1vs and l2vs are integers.
